Package msp.simulator.dynamic.guidance

Class AutomaticGuidance

  • java.lang.Object
    • msp.simulator.dynamic.guidance.AutomaticGuidance

  • public class AutomaticGuidance
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides tools to access the defined automatic attitude provider.
    Author:
    Florian CHAUBEYRE
